full_summary:
**Task Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) RFP Announcement**
====================================

**Reference**: cb-9282-14651261
**Amendment**: 3
**Publication Date**: 2023-09-20
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-11T14:00:00

**Overview**
------------

The Courts Administration Service (CAS) seeks a service provider to provide technical support, guidance, and system-related technical issue resolution for its OpenText Content Server Enterprise Content Management system.

**Selection Criteria**
------------------------

The selection of the service provider will be based on the combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Security Requirements**
---------------------------

Security Requirement: PS SRCL #19 applies. Minimum Corporate and Resource Security Requirements: Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and Enhanced Reliability.

**Contract Authority**
------------------------

Marco Pelchat, Consultant, Procurement, will be the contact person for inquiries related to this RFP requirement.

**Procedure**
-------------

Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the Qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders who are invited to bid on this requirement. Bidders are advised that "Buy and Sell.gc.ca" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.

**Method of Supply**
----------------------

The Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three (3) times per year. Suppliers interested in becoming a Qualified SA Holder should contact [RCNMDAI-NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:RCNMDAI-NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca).

**Attachments**
--------------

Tender documents and instructions are available for download from [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). The English language instructions are available at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9282/5x001-23-0431_npp_eng.pdf, and the French language instructions are available at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9282/5x001-23-0431_apm_fr.pdf.

**Inquiries**
--------------

Inquiries regarding this RFP requirement should be sent to Marco Pelchat, Consultant, Procurement, at Procurement.Approvisionnement@cas-satj.gc.ca or 613-315-7390. I hope you have rephr
